resources.string: This is a demo.\nOnly first item is working.
This is the Main Activity, here the user will select the diferents options of the app.
This is the Now Playing Activity, here we can implement the MediaPlayer Class. \nIf an track is playing show the current info, if not, show a recently played song list.

This is the My Music Activity.Show a list of all media files in my phone, should implement a ListView and may be use the MediaStore.Audio Class. Also we can implement a SearchActivity from the action bar. When a file is tapped, go to Playing Now Activity and start playing the file. For demo only the first item is working.
This is the Buy Music Activity. I implement an implicit intent for search the music on Play Store.
